abstract: With an alliance with Sun Microsystems , Google ups the ante in its efforts to offer a competitor to Microsoft Office.
snippet: With an alliance with Sun Microsystems , Google ups the ante in its efforts to offer a competitor to Microsoft Office.
lead_paragraph: Google has taken yet another step toward challenging Microsoft’s domination in word processing, spreadsheets and other productivity software.

abstract: Mitt Romney has based much of his presidential run — both its image and its financing — on his experience with and investments in private equity and other alternative assets. It now seems that the former Massachusetts governor has gained even more from those investments — and lost, too.
lead_paragraph: Mitt Romney has based much of his presidential run — both its image and its financing — on his experience with and investments in private equity and other alternative assets. It now seems that the former Massachusetts governor has gained even more from those investments — and lost, too.

headline.main: The Ups and Downs of Romney’s Portfolio
